cnc-main-applicant-full-name.label: Full name
cnc-main-applicant-full-name.hint: Enter the main applicant’s name exactly as it appears on their immigration document

cnc-main-applicant-dob.hint: Enter the date of birth as it appears in the main applicant’s immigration documents, for example 24 7 2000

cnc-main-applicant-nationality.label: Country of nationality
cnc-main-applicant-nationality.hint: This must match what is on the main applicant’s immigration document

cnc-who-is-completing.hint: This form must be completed by the same person who made the original request or their authorised legal representative

legal-rep.label: A legal representative
legal-rep.hint: This includes legal representatives of main applicants, document holders and sponsors

sponsor.label: A sponsor
sponsor.hint: Sponsor means that the application is based on the main applicant’s relationship with you

guardian.label: A dependant or guardian of a dependant

cnc-who-is-representing.hint: You must have sent a signed letter of authority to the Home Office to act on this person’s behalf

cnc-application-visa-type.legend: What type of visa is the application for?

exceptional-talent.label: Exceptional talent visa
exceptional-talent.hint: Also called tier 1 in the points-based system

skilled-worker.label: Skilled worker visa
skilled-worker.hint: Also called tier 2 in the points-based system

study.label: Study visa
study.hint: Also called tier 4 in the points-based system

temporary-worker.label: Temporary work visa
temporary-worker.hint: Also called tier 5 in the points-based system

turkish-national.label: Turkish national visa
turkish-national.hint: Includes Turkish businessperson and Turkish worker visas

cnc-further-leave-to-remain.legend: Which type of further leave did you apply for?

cnc-sponsor-type.legend: What type of sponsor are you?
cnc-sponsor-type.hint: Sponsor means that the application is based on the main applicant’s relationship with you

settle-sponsor.label: A settled sponsor
settle-sponsor.hint: You have settlement (also called indefinite leave to remain)

eea-sponsor.label: An EEA citizen sponsor
eea-sponsor.hint: You are a citizen of an EU country, Switzerland, Norway, Iceland or Lichtenstein

cnc-dependant-or-guardian.legend: Are you a dependant or a guardian of a dependant?

dependant-over-18.label: A dependant aged 18 or over
dependant-over-18.hint: You are an adult named as a dependant on the application

parent-guardian-under-18.label: A parent or guardian of a dependant who is under 18
parent-guardian-under-18.hint: You are acting on behalf of a child named as a dependant on the application

cnc-reference-number.legend: Which reference number can you provide?

record-number.label: Record number
record-number.hint: This is in the confirmation email you received when you submitted. For example, ROD123456789

case-id.label: Case ID
case-id.hint: The main applicant received this number when they applied. For example, 12345678

ho-reference-number.label: Home Office reference number
ho-reference-number.hint: This is on official documents, such as letters about your immigration status or biometric residence permit cards. For example, A1234567

payment-reference-number.label: Payment reference number
payment-reference-number.hint: This is on the letter the Home Office sent to the main applicant confirming they received an application

courier-reference-number.label: Courier reference number
courier-reference-number.hint: This includes Royal Mail reference numbers

enter-ho-reference-number.label: Enter the Home Office reference number

enter-courier-reference-number.label: Enter the courier reference number
enter-courier-reference-number.hint: Royal Mail reference numbers are between 9 and 27 characters long

british-citizenship.label: British citizenship
british-citizenship.hint: Includes status letters, right of abode, confirmation of non-acquisition, the Windrush Scheme and applications to give up citizenship

leave-to-remain.label: Further leave to remain
leave-to-remain.hint: Includes FLR (M), FLR (FP), FLR (O), and FLR (HRO) applications

ntl-or-brp.label: No time limit or replacement settlement biometric residence permit

european-settlement-scheme.label: Settled or pre-settled status under the European Union Settlement Scheme

settlement.label: Settlement
settlement.hint: Also called ‘indefinite leave to remain’ or ‘indefinite permission to stay’

toc-or-brp.label: Transfer of conditions or limited leave replacement biometric residence permit

cnc-email.label: Email address
cnc-email.hint: This is where the Home Office will contact you about your request to cancel documents being returned

cnc-telephone.label: Contact telephone number
cnc-telephone.hint: For international numbers, include the country code
